section.title: Modification Logs view
section.para: The Modification Logs view shows all sucessful and failed modifications.

simplesect.title: Concept
simplesect.para: All modify operations are logged to a logfile in LDIF format. Additionally the result (OK or ERROR) is prepended as LDIF comment to every log record.
The modification logging mechanism works with logfile rotation. It uses 10 logfiles each with 100KB per connection.
